title: One Of Four
description: During school days, Sunghyun was diagnosed  as an omega. During his childhood, he became friends with four people and soon they were cut out of his life. He reunite with them whom he thought he would never meet again. One day, Sunghyun was surrounded by four alphas who were coincidentally his childhood friend. They were all in heat and no matter how much pills he took to lessen the heat, it was impossible...
